issue.title: Size of the wkt organism perimeter
issue.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

The size of the WKT organism perimeter is limited to 65535 character.
It should be extended by changing type in mysql to longtext

**Fixed versions :** 4.4.0

comments.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène
